title: THAT WOULD HAVE BEEN WONDERFUL - serif - fond ID
content:
Looking for a font ID on this lovely serif typeface.

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063508im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_lrroi3Tw7b1qgnecwo1_1280_4988.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_lrroi3Tw7b1qgnecwo1\_1280.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063508/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_lrroi3Tw7b1qgnecwo1_1280.jpg) | 356.63 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
I did not find a perfect match.  
A little too condensed, but the leg on the \_R\_ is a fair fit, Madison Antiqua Cond Bold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063508im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MadisonAntiquaCondBoldAsWONDERFUL_4255.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/madison-antiqua/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063508/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/madison-antiqua/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/madison-antiqua/")  
Don

Some similarity to Abril Display Bold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063508im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AbrilDisplayBoldAsWONDERFUL_3732.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/abril/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063508/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/abril/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/abril/")  
Don
